func.title: ReplaceString

param.name: text
param.desc: Source string in which the replacements occur.

param.name: to
param.desc: New substring by which the old substrings will be replaced.

func.desc: Returns a string in which all occurrences of a substring (from) got replaced by a different string (to).

example.code: Log(ReplaceString("An apple a day keeps the apple away.", "apple", "banana"));
example.text: Displays "An banana a day keeps the banana away."
